The Mess assigned to any individual is binding on him/her and unquestionable. 
The developers maintain the right to block any user’s account at any time we want to. 
Misuse of any kind will lead to immediate termination of the user’s account



Payment and Pricing : 

All the financial transactions are powered by Instamojo. 
To maximize security, the app does not hold any credit card / debit card details. They are held by third party payment providers. 
The developers reserve the absolute right to accept or refuse any payment made in any form. 
We aim to debit the money from your account within three working days after completion of the transaction. 
The payment is non-refundable, subject to certain cases. For any queries regarding refund contact at help.messedup@gmail.com



Points to be noted :


Mess is assigned to the user, everyday which is open for lunch or dinner. 
A unique QR code is generated for the user when the payment gets confirmed.


'Groups': 
Why groups? : As mess is assigned to you everyday, there's a chance that you could receive another mess than the one of your friend's. To enjoy the day with your friend you could add him in your group so that we assign the same mess !


Changing of groups between the month isn't allowed.Will be made available in the upcoming updates. 
Maximum members allowed in a group are 3 as of now!


You may subscribe for next month at any time you wish. You can add your friends for the next month once they have confirmed their payment as well. Thus your group can be changed every month. 
Your friends for this month won't be carry forwarded
